title: Am I the only one who thinks Arbiter Vel'koz is just awesome?
body: Seriously, check out those particles! Riot Skin Design team sure did one hell of a job. Nice one!

replies.body: The carrier has arrived

Does anyone still remember the Arbiters from the original Startcraft?

http://www.sc2mapster.com/media/attachments/33/80/arbiterinCutscene.jpg
Yes, i think is a copy or a honor to the team of blizzard and star craft but anyways it is similar
Weakest shiet ever. But annoying at the same time. Good ol' days...
too stronk.

Yeah, it pretty much *is* the SC2 aesthetic, but it's still pretty awesome :)

It makes me wish Azir's galactic skin was changed to Arbiter Azir, because we all know he's a high templar and his soldiers are dark templar lol

Azir as Arbiter would've had almost no change. Arbiter, quite like (in my opinion) the Justicar skin line is identifiable by golden, cyan and white or silver color patterns. Azir is already one hell of a golden bird, so there'd be barely any change to his visuals, at least none really differentiating him from his classic skin.

That aside, HOLY CRAP ARBITER VEL'KOZ HOLD ME BACK
I really love all the bright and like, holy skins that Riot makes. This one is an absolute must. Plus, I feel his W's hitbox is displayed in a much better way than on any of his other skins.
I didn't mean they should change the visual appearance, just that they should change the name because he pretty much is a starcraft character because he fits with carrier vel'koz
LOL{{champion:119}}

{{champion:89}} : "Praise the Sun!"
{{champion:161}} : "HELLO I AM THE SUN"

You forgot something on that title
http://i2.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/original/000/010/856/4fcdf2e118613355b500ba5d.jpg

Inferno {{champion:75}} : I am the final arbiter.

Arbiter {{champion:161}} : ...

Inferno {{champion:75}} : ...

Arbiter {{champion:161}}: It seems your chances of survival are less than... Zero. Shoop da whoop

Today we got a Vel'koz skin....

If your day didn't automatically click to at least 'good' from whatever it was, you've probably never played Vel'koz.

343 Guilty spark?
http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120305025549/halo/images/1/1f/343_Guilty_Spark-transparent.png
Best death and recall animations ever! I will buy him and all I will do is recall and die!
Lightbringer Vel'koz ..since copyright :(
Arbiter is a 2000+ year old Roman name, you can't hold copyright over it any more than you could over John or Larry or any other given name.

> [{quoted}](name=Conncept,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AXArib7q,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-01-14T09:23:02.776+0000)
>
> Arbiter is a 2000+ year old Roman name, you can't hold copyright over it any more than you could over John or Larry or any other given name.

Larry Vel'Koz skin confirmed.
You are not the only one anything.
Wallet is primed and ready for Arbiter Vel Koz and perhaps Firecracker Jinx ;)
Lol they make a skin for Vel 'koz but not Zac
You're not the only one. I honestly hated Battlecast Vel'Koz and wanted him to get a decent skin. And then this came out and it is GORGEOUS. Thank you Rito
Like the day before it was announced I was wanting a velkoz skin, but I didn't think it would be released for awhile, then this pops up and I get excited
his ult isnt quite as satisfying in this skin i thought it would be cool if they gave him the sound effects the angels from evangelion make when they laser.
I imagine it looks better in motion...looks too much like banana spaghetti in pictures

At first I thought it was some kind of another mechanical but when they posted what it looked like in game i was like "My wallet is ready"

I like the idea of it being a non-corrupted for justice theme like they did with Varus and Aatrox!  I hope we see one for Thresh some day :D

Now just give him a higher base MS/mobility and he'll be playable :^)

Sick skin though. Wish they'd make more like this.

He already has one of the highest base MS of any ranged champion and is more then playable. Vel'koz is a mid game monster who can single handedly turn a team to dust with proper positioning or if ignored by the enemy team. His laning phase and late are average but the power he brings in the mid game with his ultimate pretty much ensures dragon control for his team and can easily be used to snowball a win.
Its pretty awesome im jealous

I really love the aesthetic feel and idea of this scheme, but his tentacles appear to be suffering from nocturne trail-itus.  The glowing trails for tentacles were a rad idea, but holy shit do they look awful at joints. Everything else about the skin is amazing, but when the camera turns just right (or wrong) the tentacle bends over itself sort of, and it just looks a little messy. You can see it in OP's first picture.

yup

you are literally the only one who likes it

literally no one else likes it but you

As I was looking at the PBE notes, and seeing the different champions skins, I was thinking to myself, "of course there's no Vel...oh sh!t that skin is awesome." He's one of my favorite champs to play as landing full combos just feel very satisfying, probably why I like playing other champs like Malz. Can't wait to pick that skin up though, really cool looking design.
I'm totally gonna buy this when it comes out.

i expected this to be an Arc Light Vel'koz.

something like that skin of Varus, since they share alot of visual effects
Amazing skin, but i'm still casually waiting for a Zac skin...

Well, another name change occurre. I liked "Arbitor" over the move to "Arclight." I understand why, it's to relate it to Varus' theme, but I mean, it's a bit too bright I feel to fit. And his mask (or rather the armor around the single orb) makes Arbitor fit. I wish they would consider the final name before showcasing the skin, but I guess that's what the PBE is about.
this is awesome but i dont see it in the store?? wtf
It will be released in patch 5.2
I would so buy this.

I like the tentacles but dislike the main body. 

If it was angelic rather than robotic I would buy instantly but unfortunately the robot theme is just so saturated.

I do like, i think the laser needs to be on par with the "blow torch" of his BC Skin. His W is kinda wonky too, i feel it would be hard to see in a high combat situation. his Q is sweet and his model is pretty damn good if you ask me
Now my main mid laner can incinerate people with beams of justice!
Ya hes cool, i already own Battlecast Vel'koz and didnt think id want another Vel'koz skin but......
It's beautiful, in an I'm-going-to-kill-you sort of way.
YES PLEASE HOLY HELL YES
I personally love it. It doesn't seem to be getting as much hype as other new skins and updates, but I think it looks awesome.
It's okay, I think it belongs as a 975 though. It doesnt offer what Battlecast does. Also: not Flying Spaghetti MOnster--dont want.

The spell effects are really disappointing :|
They don't have that same brutal quality (I know that's probably the point but to me they just feel wrong)
I think it's amazing , also, am I the only one that thinks it look's like an angelic sort of them?
